metadata.Description: Sustainable Transport Policy aims to transition public and private transportation systems to more sustainable practices, including the use of renewable energy, enhancing energy efficiency, and reducing greenhouse gas emissions.

Sustainable Transport Policy.Description: The policy upgrades public transit systems to be more efficient and less polluting, encouraging public use over private vehicles.
It develops comprehensive cycling infrastructure to promote cycling as a healthy and environmentally friendly mode of transport.
The policy advocates for electric mobility, supporting the transition to electric vehicles and charging infrastructure development.
It coordinates with urban planning to ensure that city layouts facilitate sustainable transport options, reducing the need for long commutes.
The policy reforms freight transport solutions to improve logistics efficiency and reduce emissions from heavy-duty vehicles.
It implements pollution control measures that target emissions from transport, significantly improving air quality in urban areas.
